ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50 Cypridopsis vidua (Ostracod, Seed shrimp, mature) 0.25 mg/L/48 hr (95% confidence limit 0.15-0.42 mg/L). Static bioassay without aeration, 21 °C, water hardness 272 ppm as calcium carbonate. /Technical material, 97.7%/
LC50 Asellus brevicaudus (Aquatic sowbug, mature) 0.23 mg/L/96 hr (95% confidence limit 0.16-0.33 mg/L). Static bioassay without aeration, 15 °C, water hardness 272 ppm. /Technical material, 97.7%/

LC50 Gammarus fasciatus (Scud, mature) 14.0 mg/L/96 hr (95% confidence limit 9.6-20.0 mg/L). Static bioassay without aeration, 15 °C, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/L as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/L. /Technical material, 97.7%/

LC50 Palaemonetes kadiakensis (Grass shrimp, freshwater prawn, juvenile) 0.53 mg/L/96 hr (95% confidence limit 0.14-2.0 mg/L). Static bioassay without aeration, 21 °C, water hardness 272 ppm. /Technical material, 97.7%/

LC50 Oncorhynchus mykiss (Rainbow trout, weight 1.3 g) 4.3 mg/L/96 hr (95% confidence limit 3.9-4.7 mg/L). Static bioassay without aeration, 12 °C, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/L as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/L. /Technical material, 97.7%/

LC50 Lepomis macrochirus (Bluegill sunfish, weight 1.2 g) 2.5 mg/L/96 hr (95% confidence limit 1.7-3.7 mg/L). Static bioassay without aeration, 24 °C, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/L as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/L. /Technical material, 97.7%/
